Events – Vue on 30a Skip to content Sunset Time (CDT): 07:01 PM Facebook Instagram X-twitter Reservations menu About Us Our Story Employment Weddings & Events Weddings Full Club Reception Full Club Ceremony + Reception West Wing Wedding Ceremony + Reception Main Terrace Wedding Ceremony + Reception Beach Ceremony Bridal Suite Events Full Club Private Event West Wing Private Event Board Room Private Event Gift cards Contact Menu Reservations menu About Us Our Story Employment Weddings & Events Weddings Full Club Reception Full Club Ceremony + Reception West Wing Wedding Ceremony + Reception Main Terrace Wedding Ceremony + Reception Beach Ceremony Bridal Suite Events Full Club Private Event West Wing Private Event Board Room Private Event Gift cards Contact Elevate YOUR PRIVATE EVENT Celebrate life’s milestones, wins, and corporate events with breathtaking views of Florida’s Gulf Coast at Vue on 30a. CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR WE ACCOMODATE ANY Occasion CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR Corporate Dinner Showers Birthday Parties Special Occasions Holiday Parties CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR PLAN YOUR EVENT Your Way Indoors, our expansive floor-to-ceiling windows capture every breathtaking sunset, while outdoors, the gentle ocean breeze adds a touch of magic to your special event. With its sleek, contemporary design and warm, inviting ambiance, Vue sets the stage for moments you and your guests won’t soon forget. Our versatile venue can accommodate a range of event sizes, from corporate dinners to big celebrations, with seating for up to 180 guests. Whether you’re gathering for the holidays or throwing a birthday bash, Vue offers a truly one-of-a-kind experience. West Wing + Terrace PRIVATE EVENT ACCOMMODATES 20 – 35 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Full Club PRIVATE EVENT ACCOMMODATES 70-180 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Board Room PRIVATE EVENT ACCOMMODATES 20 – 35 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Testimonials Perfect! Great food and service! We couldn't be more satisfied! Perfect for our small reception dinner! emily My wife and I dined twice at Vue on 30a during our recent visit to celebrate our 30th Anniversary. You, the entire staff and the food were incredible! We have told all our friends to make sure to dine with you during their upcoming visits. Eric The food and service were fantastic and the venue is classy and gorgeous. There were several options for the ceremony/cocktail hour/reception, all right on the beach with an amazing view. They did a great job in making our wedding unforgettable for everyone that was there. Amanda Great food and service. The vue is spectacular. Reservations are recommended. We went at 2pm and had no crowd problems. Got busy later that night. Previous Next ARE YOU READY TO Elevate YOUR EVENT? We would be delighted to host you. Please contact our dedicated Private Events Director with any inquiries, and let us help you create memories that will last a lifetime. Weddings – Vue on 30a Skip to content Sunset Time (CDT): 07:01 PM Facebook Instagram X-twitter Reservations menu About Us Our Story Employment Weddings & Events Weddings Full Club Reception Full Club Ceremony + Reception West Wing Wedding Ceremony + Reception Main Terrace Wedding Ceremony + Reception Beach Ceremony Bridal Suite Events Full Club Private Event West Wing Private Event Board Room Private Event Gift cards Contact Menu Reservations menu About Us Our Story Employment Weddings & Events Weddings Full Club Reception Full Club Ceremony + Reception West Wing Wedding Ceremony + Reception Main Terrace Wedding Ceremony + Reception Beach Ceremony Bridal Suite Events Full Club Private Event West Wing Private Event Board Room Private Event Gift cards Contact Weddings WITH A VIEW Celebrate your most precious moments against the stunning backdrop of Florida’s Gulf Coast at Vue on 30a. As the proud recipient of the title “Best Wedding Venue” by Visit South Walton, Vue (French for “view”) offers unparalleled panoramic vistas of the Gulf of Mexico, creating an enchanting atmosphere for your wedding. If you’re planning your dream wedding, Vue provides the perfect setting to elevate it to new heights. CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR AN Abundance OF OPTIONS Indoors, our expansive floor-to-ceiling windows capture every breathtaking sunset, while outdoors, the gentle ocean breeze adds a touch of magic to your wedding celebration. With its sleek, contemporary design and warm, inviting ambiance, Vue sets the stage for unforgettable moments. Our versatile venue can accommodate weddings of various sizes, from intimate gatherings to grand affairs, with seating for up to 180 guests. From exchanging vows to breathtaking receptions, Vue on 30a offers a truly exceptional experience. CONTACT OUR EVENTS DIRECTOR Full Club WEDDING RECEPTION ACCOMMODATES 70 -180 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Full Club WEDDING CEREMONY + RECEPTION ACCOMMODATES 70 -180 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY West Wing WEDDING CEREMONY + RECEPTION ACCOMMODATES 20 - 35 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Main Terrace WEDDING CEREMONY + RECEPTION ACCOMMODATES 20 - 70 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Beach CEREMONY ACCOMMODATES UP TO 180 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Bridal SUITE ACCOMMODATES UP TO 16 GUESTS VIEW GALLERY Reviews Our wedding day was so special and we were so lucky to have had the Vue as our venue. Not only was the venue perfect, the staff was phenomenal and the food was beyond amazing. It exceeded every expectation that we had. Thank you for everything you did to make the day as special as it was- it honestly could not have been a better day. And again, the staff were fantastic. From the bartenders to the servers and chef- we have received so many raving reviews! Ally & Connor We couldn’t be happier with our wedding at Vue on 30a! From start to finish, everything was absolutely amazing. The views are the best on 30a and the staff is so kind and accommodating! Every single guest commented on how great the food was (I’m still dreaming about the seafood pasta!) We can’t say enough great things about Vue on 30! Kendall S. I cannot recommend Vue on 30a as a wedding venue enough! The event specialist was amazing from start to finish. She was so quick to respond when I inquired about the venue and was happy to answer my questions about even the smallest details as I worked with my wedding planner to plan my wedding. My wedding day was absolutely perfect at Vue on 30a. Our guests had an amazing time and the staff was so wonderful to us. Our family and friends have wonderful memories and will treasure that day for years to come. Highly recommend Vue on 30a! Macy We had our rehearsal party here. Food, service, everything was excellent! Very professional! We highly recommend! Samantha The food and service were fantastic and the venue is classy and gorgeous. There were several options for the ceremony/cocktail hour/reception, all right on the beach with an amazing view. They did a great job in making our wedding unforgettable for everyone that was there. Amanda Previous Next ARE YOU READY TO MAKE YOUR WEDDING Unforgettable AT VUE ON 30a? We would be delighted to host you. Please contact our dedicated Private Events Director with any inquiries, and let us help you create memories that will last a lifetime. Terms of Service | Privacy Policy Browse Nearby General Info 4801 W County Hwy 30A Santa Rosa Beach, FL 32459 850-267-2305 http://www.vueon30a.com/ Payment Types Visa MasterCard Discover American Express Cuisine American - Contemporary American - Traditional Bar Meals Lunch Dinner Hours Monday: Closed Tuesday: 11:00am - 9:00pm Wednesday: 11:00am - 9:00pm Thursday: 11:00am - 9:00pm Friday: 11:00am - 9:00pm Saturday: 11:00am - 9:00pm Sunday: Closed About Us Since opening their doors in 1971, Vue on 30a has showcased one of the most sought after, panoramic dining experiences on the Gulf. The restaurant has claimed its fair share of accolades with its fresh approach to dining, including delicious menus thoughtfully designed by a culinary team of experts and its wine menu which easily matches the caliber of the food. The restaurant was named “Best Fine Dining” by Visit South Walton and continues to be a “Most Booked” restaurant at OpenTable.com. See Us On Zomato Foursquare Yelp

Our Story – Vue on 30a Skip to content Sunset Time (CDT): 07:01 PM Facebook Instagram X-twitter Reservations menu About Us Our Story Employment Weddings & Events Weddings Full Club Reception Full Club Ceremony + Reception West Wing Wedding Ceremony + Reception Main Terrace Wedding Ceremony + Reception Beach Ceremony Bridal Suite Events Full Club Private Event West Wing Private Event Board Room Private Event Gift cards Contact Menu Reservations menu About Us Our Story Employment Weddings & Events Weddings Full Club Reception Full Club Ceremony + Reception West Wing Wedding Ceremony + Reception Main Terrace Wedding Ceremony + Reception Beach Ceremony Bridal Suite Events Full Club Private Event West Wing Private Event Board Room Private Event Gift cards Contact Welcome TO VUE ON 30a WHERE CULINARY Excellence MEETS SPECTACULAR VIEWS! Established in 1971, Vue on 30a is more than just a restaurant — it’s a cherished destination. As a member-owned establishment, we proudly extend our hospitality to all, inviting you to experience the finest in Gulf Coast dining. Named “Best Fine Dining” by Visit South Walton, our culinary expertise spans decades, crafting dishes that blend local flavors with international influences. From premium selections to exploratory delights, our menu offers something for every palate. Explore our intentional pairings tailored to your personal tastes, showcased on our Instagram (@vueon30a). At Vue on 30a, we believe in service-oriented hospitality, ensuring every visit is not just a meal but a memorable experience. Our knowledgeable staff is here to guide you through our offerings, enhancing your dining journey with expert recommendations and friendly service. Savor the taste of the Gulf with our thoughtfully curated wine pairings and extensive alcohol selection at our bar. Our staff is well-versed in all pairings, guaranteeing a harmonious blend of flavors with every sip. Whether you’re joining us for a special occasion or simply craving a remarkable dining experience, Vue on 30a welcomes you with open arms and a commitment to excellence. DINING CASUAL, FLAVORFUL DINING MEETS WORLD-CLASS Gulf Views An abundance of options for every palate, we offer a premium 30A dining experience. Our chef has carefully crafted a menu that is internationally inspired and features local flavors. Be sure to engage our knowledgeable team for wine pairings or recommendations that can be tailored to your preferences. VIEW OUR MENU COME FOR THE VIEWS. STAY FOR THE FOOD. DINING CASUAL, FLAVORFUL DINING MEETS WORLD-CLASS Gulf Views An abundance of options for every palate, we offer a premium 30A dining experience. Our chef has carefully crafted a menu that is internationally inspired and features local flavors. Be sure to engage our knowledgeable team for wine pairings or recommendations that can be tailored to your preferences. VIEW OUR MENU PERFECTLY PAIRED WINES AND AN Expansive SPIRITS SELECTION An abundance of options for every palate, we offer a premium 30A dining experience. Our chef has carefully crafted a menu that is internationally inspired and features local flavors. Be sure to engage our knowledgeable team for wine pairings or recommendations that can be tailored to your preferences. VIEW OUR MENU SPIRITS THE CURRENT View Wherever you are, tune into our live webcam feed to experience the view from our restaurant. Reviews Great drinks and dinner we really enjoyed it. The environment and food was wonderful. Customer from Atlanta Wonderful experience. Amazing waitress named Sandy. Couldn’t imagine spending our 27th anniversary anywhere else. Customer from Louisville Great meal. Friendly and knowledgeable server. Sat outside on covered patio with beautiful view of the ocean. Customer from Memphis Previous Next AWARDS Mentality A SERVICE-FIRST Our team at Vue on 30a has a commitment to excellence and service with an unwavering attention to detail that permeates every corner of the restaurant. Curating a hospitable and welcoming atmosphere is our priority from the second you set foot through our doors.
